climbs.name: Ukiah
climbs.fa: Ian Van Meter, Danny Mcgee, Sam Stuckey, Russ Treharne

content.description:
P1 - Start in a perfect tight hands corner before moving into a stellar lie back to the anchors. Great free climbing pitch. 10+

P2 - Free climb through a squeeze before aiding C2 through a thin crack.

P3 - Mixed free and aid in a corner to an A2 roof.

P4 - Climb the dihedral to the rim.
content.protection:
Double set of cams

Set of stoppers

6 LA's #2 and #3

Blade #5

content.description:
Pitch 1. Climb an easy less than vertical crack to a short wide crack. Climb the (short) wide section to a bulge. Move left into a tight hands flake until it brings you around the bulge. Move up and right through the last overhanging bulge with great fingers. Enjoy the lounge!

(5.8+, 160')

Pitch 2. Climb the bolt-line using small holds and occasionally the arete to the summit. You've reached the perch!

(5.10+, 40')

Descent: 2x 60M ropes.

Summit to top of pitch 1: single rope rappel.

Top of pitch 1 to ground: double rope rappel.
content.location: Locate the trail across the road and go right at the fork. Stay on the Portal Trail until you reach the switchbacks then follow small cairns. You can't miss the tower the route begins on the left side.
